days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

O Mary, you visited your cousin Elizabeth to share the joy of the Incarnation. 
Help us to recognize the presence of Christ in our lives and to bring His love to those we meet. 
You brought the light of Christ to Elizabeth’s home. 
May we bring the light of Christ to our families and communities.
Through your visitation, the Holy Spirit filled your cousin Elizabeth.
Pray for us, that we too may be filled with the Holy Spirit and proclaim the greatness of the Lord. 
O Mary, you are the Mother of our Lord and our Mother. Pray for us, that we may grow in faith, hope, and love, and bring Christ to the world.
Pray also for our intention in this novena, (mention request here…)

Concluding Prayer

Heavenly Father, You inspired the Blessed Virgin Mary, our Mother, to visit her cousin Elizabeth and assist her in her need. 
Grant that we may also serve those in need, and proclaim your greatness with sincere hearts, through Jesus Christ, our Lord. Amen.
Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
Blessed Mother and St. Elizabeth, pray for us!
